div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 14:15 pm CDT

div.span: Partly sunny, with a high near 65. Northeast wind 9 to 11 mph.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 40. Northeast wind 5 to 9 mph becoming calm after midnight.

A slight chance of rain after 8am. Partly sunny, with a high near 67. Light and variable wind becoming west 8 to 13 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

div.p: Mrs. Fountain & Mrs. Barbarick's 3rdÂ graders are hard at work in a different, but familiar environment, reading in an unusual place.Â As distance and virtual learning has been the new normal the past few weeks, several of these students have cozied up and found comfort in reading in their own homes while still completing assignments and tasks.

a.aria-label: Read more about Weekly Distance Classroom Spotlight

div.p:
These are links to online resources available to the Drexel R-IV School. All faculty, staff and students have access to these at school. Others might have access at the Cass County Library Branch in Drexel or from your home computer.
